testcase.name: Soap 1.2 URI validation Test 2
testcase.system-out: Given url "https://www.w3schools.com/xml/tempconvert.asmx" ................ passed And header Content-Type = "application/soap+xml; charset=utf-8" ........... passed And request ............................................................... passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * print responseHeaders ................................................... passed * match responseHeaders.Cache-Control == ["private, max-age=0,public"] .... passed * match responseType == "xml" ............................................. passed * print response .......................................................... passed * match response contains "206.6" ......................................... passed * match response //CelsiusToFahrenheitResult == 206.6 ..................... passed * assert responseTime <= 2000 ............................................. passed * print responseTime ...................................................... passed
